name: Índice Virtual
overview:
Índice Virtual Lda, via the online portal MyTable.pt, provides online restaurant bookings in Portugal.

The brand MyTable.pt was created by Índice Virtual Lda in 2010, and the online portal went live at the beginning of 2011. The company was started by three young entrepreneurs and was the first company in Portugal to provide automaticlly generated online restaurant bookings.

In this short time, the site has experienced good growth and the company has achieved strategic partnerships such as becoming official provider for online bookings for the Lisbon, Porto, Cascais and Loulé Restaurant Weeks.

The company provides booking widgets for partner sites, and has developed a mobile booking app for Android and iPhone.

offices.address1: Avenida António Augusto Aguiar, nº 100, 1º D
